title: Interstellar Spell Carder - Novel Updates
tags: Artifact Crafting   Calm Protagonist   Card Games   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Confident Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   Family Conflict   First Love   Futuristic Setting   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Power Couple   Revenge   Schemes And Conspiracies   Shameless Protagonist   Sharp-tongued Characters   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Virtual Reality   Weak to Strong
author: 送君十里
description:
He Yishu, the god of learning, transmigrated to the interstellar era where rune card masters and mecha warriors were respected. Everyone thought he was a loser because of his weak mental power and physique. Until one day, he inadvertently saw the famous work of a senior rune card master.

Wait!

That thing that seemed like a ghostly charm seemed to be …… Chinese characters?!>
